website_summaries.verdict: The best budget bottle of adhesive remover for the occasional accident.
pros: Adhesive remover liquid is safe enough to use on carpet, clothes, and walls to remove  tar, caulk, gum, and crayon
Bottle is small enough to fit in bags for travel
cons: Can have a difficult time on some smooth surfaces like glass

customer_reviews.title: Just a nice smelling oil.  nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of things to get the labels off bottles but I have yet to find anything that works like the infomercials would have you believe. I have put this on, waited and soaked and put this on again. There is still a residue that needs to be scrubbed off. I am not sure it is worth the money. This is an oil with a nice citrus smell. The little scraper on the lid broke off the first time I tried to use it. I will use cooking oil when this runs out. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Little Bitty

customer_reviews.title: This is a laundry miracle for dried sticker residue!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!!!! I would love to give this a 10/5! I got this to try to save 2 shirts that had went through the dryer with stickers on them and it worked like the sticker residue was NO challenge to it! One of these shirts had been worn again and dried with the sticker residue probably 10 Times and it STILL worked! Like new! A mother’s took for sure!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonders. I had gotten my son a few items of clothing for his birthday. Usually, with shirts ordered online there’s a distinct vinegar type smell which he promptly needs washed away. Unbeknownst to us, a shirt in the mix had a rather adhesive sticker attached. After washing the clothes, we noticed the adhesive gunk all over and found this product. It was fantastic! Rub it on a little vigorously, let sit for a bit, then wash. It was really that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher KR

customer_reviews.title: Not the best adhesive remover
customer_reviews.text: This is not the best adhesive remover, nor is it the worst. The scraper is useful, though the dabber top gets in the way. To remove the same adhesive, it required at this twice as much of this remover at it did a more expensive brand. I have yet to see if it removes labels from plastic bottles as well, but will post its performance against the most popular and more expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't remove it's own brand adhesive
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work to remove duck tape residue from my car after taping up a broken back window. It was a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dried up duck tape adhesive residue removal.
customer_reviews.text: This product removed years of dried up duck tape adhesive residue on a window, in a matter of a minute. With a razor blade to assist in the removal. I like the feature of the applicator. The top prevented me from not wasting the product and I was able to prevent a big mess with this feature. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for removing tape adhesive from wooden dressers
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for removing tape adhesive from wooden dressers. Just follow the instructions. One tip is I had trouble removing the adhesive with a paper towel after. It would just ball up and stay on the dresser. So i used a lint roller and that picked it up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

customer_reviews.title: helped remove 3M paint film
customer_reviews.text: The paint film on my headlights was yellowed, hazy and cracking after 8 years. I removed the film with a heat gun and then used this to get rid of the adhesive residue. It worked great along with a plastic razor blade. Be patient, it will take about three or four applications to completely remove if used on paint film.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing stickers from book covers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a product to help remove those pesky stickers from book covers. Goo Gone works great, but it smells so awful that I don't like to use it. This product, Duck Adhesive Remover, has an unoffensive citrus aroma that dissipates quickly (I always use good ventilation when using these products). I like the sponge applicator top that lets me daub the product exactly where I want it. It also makes it much easier to get just the right amount on the sticker. The protective cap incorporates a scraper, which is convenient and saves my fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: LuvDachsies

customer_reviews.title: This adhesive remover does the trick, removes those pesky stickers, if leave it on for a while...
customer_reviews.text: This Duck adhesive\sticker remover does what it says it does as advertised, if you leave it on the area you want to clean up or upon the sticker you want to remove for at least two minutes, and use an actual exacto knife or razor blade to remove the sticker instead of the flimsy bottle cap scraper that this product comes with...
customer_reviews.author: Russell M. Taunton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product was completely useless and did not work at all for removing adhesives. I tried to use this multiple times to remove price stickers from items (e.g. mugs, bowls, etc.) and it never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Syd C

customer_reviews.title: You had one job Duck!!
customer_reviews.text: A parking cop was nice enough to put a tow warning sticker on my driver side window while my car was parked in front of my house(lol). This stuff DID NOT HELP AT ALL. It did leave my window oily. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra $ for Goo Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Works on Leather Material
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my leather (cheap/fake material) jacket had a large size of adhesive stuck to it from a mouse trap. I was ready to get rid of it, but the jacket was only 2 months old and barely worn. I searched and searched for something that would work on leather and this product did just that. It removed everything as I was allowing the product. Now my jacket is back to perfection and wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually worked!
customer_reviews.text: Actually worked to remove old contact paper in the kitchen of the house we bought. Nothing else would remove the old adhesive. Cabinets did feel a little greasy after using so I ended up painting cabinet paint in those cabinets as well. In the end it worked great and cabinets look good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D.

customer_reviews.title: The scraper cap is super helpful and this has a nice smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really worked! I’m sure it depends on what you are trying to remove and how long it was there but this only took about 10-15 mins to remove an old sticker off of a used car I bought. The scraper cap is super helpful and this has a nice smell, an oily type effect but not terrible. Quite the arm work out too, I recommend pushing up on what you are removing vs down. Pushing hard into it got it off easier too. It was a sticker and flaked off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: First I think it was use. It was not in the original package. It was rolling around in the shipping box. I used this product after my first disappointment and found this do not work on heavy duty jobs. If you want to remove a price tag sticker this is your product but beyond that it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in open package, possibly even used . Not worth sending back at the time. Does not remove adhesive from decal stickers on car windows. Not really sure what this product is actually supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Roth

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Results
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. A little goes a long way in removing tar splattered on the side walls of my car. No harsh solvents so it was safe on my clear coat paint. In less than a minute, the tar easily flaked off with the aid of the plastic scrapper cap on the product bottle. Some tree sap was also easily removed the same way but took a minute or so longer for the product to work its magic.
customer_reviews.author: MelloPi

customer_reviews.title: Good product, no toxic petroleum smell!!
customer_reviews.text: My goodness this is great stuff. I do remove most of the paper of the label first. I greatly appreciate the absence of the toxic petroleum smell of similar products. More like and orange oil substance. I will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: rivergirl

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this product based on some of the positive reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product based on some of the positive reviews and it didn't get the job done for me. I used it to try to remove the residual adhesive left behind after removing the side molding on a 25 year old car. I tried being patient and giving the product time to soak and soften, I tried using a heat gun to soften and make the product's job easier, I used the included scraper, I rubbed and rubbed, I tried a 2nd, even a 3rd application and it would not remove all the adhesive. I think for this job, only a 3M eraser wheel is going to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: at first left oily-like ring on clothing
customer_reviews.text: It did partially work on those stickers that Undo did not work for at all. One drawback was that when I used it on clothing, it did remove sticky stuff, but also after drying out at first left barely noticeable oil-like area. And it does feel oily. And I don't care about the lemon scent they added, hope it's not that useless addition that causes this slight oily consistency. Just checked the clothing item and after several days the slight oily ring disappeared completely I think. I guess it is better to launder any clothing after applying this.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Novo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Gets all the sticky stuff off left behind by labels, and I used it to clean the sticky residue off some peel and stick tiles I put down. Should always keep some of this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Texasdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Ive had very good success with this product (Ive bought multiple times). It has been able to get off a lot of sticky messes (some of which had been stuck on for more than a year). I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to remove a very noticeable black stripe across the hood of my silver-colored car, 1/4" to 1/2" wide and composed of a very sticky adhesive mixed with dirt, where an "invisible bra" (transparent self-adhesive film to protect the hood from flying debris) had lifted along the edge and also pulled back due to shrinkage from seven years of outside parking. I applied the liquid with the applicator, waited, and used the scraper to remove this unsightly mess. There was no apparent damage to the paint. (I was then able to pare away the strip of lifted film with an Exacto -- much more nerve wracking than the Duck process.)
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Adhesive Remover
customer_reviews.text: I am a painter and I paint wine bottles among other things. This is the BEST adhesive remover I have found. It does have a little bit of an oily residue so I use it on things I can wash afterwards (glass, plastic, etc). I do use it also to remove residue from stickers on books. I just clean it real good afterwards. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Grandma

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this worked flawlessly! Removed spray adhesive from glass widows, and sticker residue from metal with the most minimal amount of effort! Leaves the surface of applied location shiny and looking good. Best to whip dry with a towel when you're finished scrubbing to take away and oil left behind. Isn't incredibly oily, just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchase
customer_reviews.text: The only goop to remove my adhesion issues, you do have to let the product soak and use the tip of the cap for better scraping without damaging items. a little oily.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells good, scraper top is very handy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I've been a long time user of goof-off but had some recent troubles with it damaging plastic on vintage items so I wanted to try something a little bit more gentle. I was skeptical about this working but was pleasantly surprised when it did work well. It doesn't smell of heavy chemicals. I really like the scraper top as well. I use this mostly to get price tags or stickers off vintage toys and cardboard hang tags for old toys or products. It works great for that, doesn't damage my items and leaves no mess behind.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Let it sit on the residue for more than 30s
customer_reviews.text: This works well for removing the residue from 3d printer surface mats. The only real complaint is that it requires thoroughly soaking the reside and letting it sit for more than the prescribed 30s. Once you've soaked it, you can use the flat edge on the top with pretty good precision, though a larger length edge would be much easier.
customer_reviews.author: einsteinxx

customer_reviews.title: Quick
customer_reviews.text: I wondered if this product would do the touch job I had ahead of me and it surpassed what I expected. I ordered three hoping it would work and it did beyond what I expected. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive Remover
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. It works well at removing those damn labels that are on everything. The applicator is handy, as is the plastic scraper.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Price is right; nothing else is
customer_reviews.text: Cheap enough to be worth a try--but on use this disappoints. First, smells oily--and is oily if you get some on your hands. And if you're trying to use in a tight spot, say the corner of your car windshield, good luck. The scraper is a challenge to use while attached to the bottle, and the little sponge gets grungy with any adhesive you're trying to remove. In a few tries, the duck got some of the old decal adhesive off but fluffed the rest, even after two applications . Had to use an old shave blade. Live and learn. If it's too cheap . . .
customer_reviews.author: A Dogged shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Removed old labels from a desk organizer and it was very easy and worked like a charm
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Gunk Remover with an Orange Scent
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of an obsessive collector of blu-rays, and I mainly use this to get retail stickers off of their slipcovers (stickers which Amazon fortunately never applies). It's a somewhat slow process, but it's more inviting when the adhesive remover has a pleasant smell. The scraper cap is also pretty useful.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur Cobb

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: this stuff works great. i tried it on two large labels that had been stuck to a metal fuse box cover for years. one came off immediately. the other, that had likely been stuck on for many years, needed time. they say 30 seconds, but if the label is strongly adhered, i recommend leaving the remover on for a while...twenty minutes or so. after that i scraped it off like a second skin. the best product like this i have tried. the sponge applicator makes it easy to apply even on a vertical surface like a wall
customer_reviews.author: AngieB

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: I've applied and scraped and applied and scraped over and over and it's not getting the 3M tape off of my bumper. Really hoped it would work for me! Hopefully I can return.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It did exactly what it was supposed to do - REMOVE SUPER GLUE!! It took a little elbow grease and a little time, but it worked. I used is on a granite counter top and there was absolutely no damage.
customer_reviews.author: melanie vernon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect .
customer_reviews.text: Removed window , tape residue left , goo gone , + others did not work , this worked . I am glad I waited for this to arrive. I had a clean surface to apply new foam double sided tape and install the replacement window as should be.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used the remover on so many labels. It works great and goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthiag

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how you do it but keep up the good work
customer_reviews.text: This product works great no more torn pages it takes the lane clean off
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR M. ARCHMBAULT

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work as Well as I Thought It Would
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to get the sticky stuff off where I had taped plastic to my truck where a window had been broken. WD-40 didn't work very well so I decided to try this. A little better but not much. Got some more work to do to remove all of the goo... trying Goo Gone next. Update: seems like good old sunshine will degrade the adhesive. I wiped at the marks the other day and a LOT of it just came right off. Another couple of weeks of direct sun may do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: William G. Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! I've never tried any other brands for this kind of product, but this one is great enough that I won't need to shop around. Apply a light layer and let sit for a minute or so, then wipe off the label/goo with a paper towel. I usually don't need the scraper because the remover has soaked through and loosened the adhesive, but it's nice to have just in case. The citrus scent is light, so whatever you apply this to will smell orange-y for a bit and then back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Lee

customer_reviews.title: better than Goo Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Goo Gone was not getting it done, so I decided to try this. Worked great. I never write reviews but wanted to tell die hard GooGone fans to give this a try. Amazing and scrapper cap works well too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take the tags of of some glasses. Don't work. A waste of time and especially money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brathwaite

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. Purchased an old house
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Purchased an old house. Had one of those very thin vinyl stickers on a varnished wood door. A little patience, a little elbow grease...it came off leaving no marks on the door. I will be keeping this handy for all sticky jobs!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good product I use it at work which is a school.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Kinda weak.
customer_reviews.text: It removes adhesives, but doesn't do too good of a job on glass. Some of my glass furniture came with tape on them, and this removed the adhesive residue after rigorous wiping. It doesn't 'melt' adhesive residues away like other products I've tried. Also, under a light you can see that the adhesive is still there even though you can't feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny D

customer_reviews.title: No luck.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stinks. And I feel like it just makes a huge mess. Purchased it to attempt to get registration stickers off of our car after moving out of state and it didn't really help much. The scraper cap is a joke. Maybe this would work better for easier jobs, but due to the placement of our window stickers and whatever adhesive was used on them, this didn't help with removal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mands

customer_reviews.title: used to remove adhesive from dash board
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to get that sticky-foam stuff off my dash board in my car that held those round things for suction cups - you know, to like mount your GPS or your phone...in my case I had both, 2 mounts stuck to the dash with this foamy, gross sticky stuff that wouldn't come off. I used this stuff and now you wouldn't even know anything had been there! Didn't discolor my dash either. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diana M

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. Took off the stuck on rubber that melted to the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Goo Gone is much easier to use and much much less toxic. I missed the return window closed so .... I think Amazon's return window is shrinking....
customer_reviews.author: M. dotson

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stuff, 5 stars! Got glue off my desk quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good chemical but lousy packaging
customer_reviews.text: The remover itself is a miracle drug. It will work almost adhesive right off the surface in just a couple of minutes. However, the plastic scraper at the top is worthless for difficult jobs...find something else. I was removing a used-car logo from the back of a vehicle: a notoriously tough adhesive. This liquid made WD-40 look like Kool-Aid. It came off, but the scraper on this thing snapped right off.
customer_reviews.author: George Mount

customer_reviews.title: Good product, can't find anything that works better
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work on most glues. The tip is also a clever idea because it can be used as a tool to scrape the glue away. But for me, I wish it had been made out of slightly stronger material. It would also be nice to have an adhesive remover that is more of a gel so it sticks to surfaces better.
customer_reviews.author: Brett O.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really get the goo off, just made it smush around.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it will be
customer_reviews.text: The flap on the cap used for scrapping broke while using for the first time. It's pretty difficult to remove tags after the scrapper broke. It also leaves an unpleasant smelling residue that's hard to remove and needs to be washed multiple times. Too bad, I was really excited about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: the liquid acts as a great lubricant. On some labels
customer_reviews.text: Use it at the office for removing pesky labels. For labels it doesn't penetrate well, the liquid acts as a great lubricant. On some labels, soaking it through and giving it a few scrapes at a corner allows the label to just lift off cleanly and completely without residue. I would suggest also have a sharp edge handy if the scraper cap is too dull.
customer_reviews.author: achao

customer_reviews.title: didn't really work
customer_reviews.text: I've had glow-in-the-dark stars sticky-tacked to my ceiling since I was a kid, and over ten years later I decided it was time to remove them. Unfortunately, though I was able to get the blue tack off, this stuff left blue stains on my ceiling. Obviously it looks better than blobs of tack, but it wasn't completely effectual. Maybe this is more a problem with the tack and than this product though.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Michaels

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff for removing sticky goo and price tags
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use this stuff for everything. It takes off the goo left over after you take a price tag off something. It takes off any residual tape or stickers on products you buy/etc. You just have to be careful not to take the paint or finish off something with it. I couldn't find it in the store when we ran out so I ended up ordering it off Amazon. Definitely a good item to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Violet-NY

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: SIMPLY DID NOT WORK WELL. BARELY SOFTENED OLD ADHESIVE, WHEN I WAS EXPECTING IT TO DISSOLVE IT. SPONGE BOTTLE/SCRAPER AWKWARD TO USE. THIS MIGHT WORK FOR SOME ONE WHO DOES LIGHT CRAFT WORK, BUT, DON'T EXPECT IT TO CLEAN UP OLD TAPE RESIDUE THAT'S BEEN AROUND A WHILE.
customer_reviews.author: patchee woznid

customer_reviews.title: When I was removing some old things with super glue it came off great with ease
customer_reviews.text: When I was removing some old things with super glue it came off great with ease. When I bought this new piece and superglued it with fresh glue but the job went wrong and trying to remove it was definitely a challenge, when I was almost done the orange tip broke off.
customer_reviews.author: April A.

customer_reviews.title: Some liquid removers remove some better than others
customer_reviews.text: Library book labels can be difficult to remove. Some liquid removers remove some better than others. You just have to try products which will remove your particular label. I use Duck Brand Adhesive Remover (and) Un-Du. When one won't work, usually the other one will.
customer_reviews.author: William Rakozy

customer_reviews.title: Great sticker remover!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for removing sticky labels, etc. The little scraper on top is a gentle way to push the label off once the Duck formula has been on there for 10-15 seconds. Couldn't find it in stores so glad I found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cush

customer_reviews.title: Quick and effective
customer_reviews.text: Used to remove foam door facing strips, this product works fast with little scraping or reapplication.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is excellent. Worked as intended and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is excellent. Worked as intended and easy to use. The liquid comes out a little quick; if I had to think of anything else. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel J.

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective at removing stickers my kids stuck on our computer ...
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective at removing stickers my kids stuck on our computer desk. I let the product sit overnight, and I still had to vigorously scrape the stickers off the desk. NO BUEÑO
customer_reviews.author: Never360

customer_reviews.title: Used item was taped up and mailed to me
customer_reviews.text: There was no quality check done on the item before it was shipped. I am a very disappointed prime member who will not renew membership unless I get refund on my item.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It does not work for me. I fellow the ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not work for me. I fellow the instruction and did it 3 times. The adhesive is still there...it might not work for some...check before i buy
customer_reviews.author: Chang

customer_reviews.title: Love the applicator! Not the super-strongest I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Love the applicator -- it keeps you from wasting product. The scraper cap isn't all that great though.. I ended up using a box-cutter blade and it worked beautifully to take off powerful adhesive decals from a window. I have seen stronger "goo-removers" but this one is a good strength for most projects.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Has a cap that can be used as a scraper. Very handy! I bought this product because I put a shoe pad on the inside of my shoe w/ incredibly sticky stuff to keep the insert in place which I needed to remove. I would have had to ditch the shoes if I didn't get the sticky residue off. This remover took under a minute to work!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Duck Brand Adhesive Remover is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of funny that the Duck Brand has you coming and going. Buy their duct tape. Then, buy their adhesive remover! This works great at removing scotch tape from counters, removing price tags etc. It has a nice scraper on the cap that helps with the removal.
customer_reviews.author: marintravelbuff

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It has a really strong smell and sort of takes a while to get off your fingers if you get it on you, but it got all the sticky stuff off my glass jars and vases. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jbid

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not much better than regular oil, or edible oil. The sponge applicator and the built-in scraper are useful.
customer_reviews.author: scb123

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This works well. Used to use lighter fluid to remove stickers. Always worked well but hard to get that smell from the item. This has an annoying smell, too but is not that hard to remove with soapy, warm water. The top is useful. So are plastic utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Sashin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five starts if it evaporated the label and disappeared. However, this stuff does work great and has been greatly helpful with removal if all types of adhesive. There is some scraping involved, but it works better than anything else I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: James F Simms

customer_reviews.title: Works as Well as High-Priced Glue Remover.
customer_reviews.text: Works as well or better than the high-priced glue remover.
customer_reviews.author: Neschie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Need some extra effort but it works
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't soften the adhesive that much so you need some effort in scraping the remaining adhesive, so I can tell that the cap is really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, mild adhesive remover
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this is that it is mild, so it doesn't ruin the underlying material. I've used it on cloth-covered books to remove stickers and there's no sign it was ever used. For tougher problems, there are much stronger removers, but it's best to use this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Stinky , and it Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Gunk Remover I have used. Nice applicator and a citrus smell. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: salina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it on my videogames to remove any stickers they put on the cases and it comes off without any left over gunk. I also use this on my pocket knife cleaning off the tape goo left on the blade and it cleans it off very easily. I highly recommend this item for whatever sticky situation you have.
customer_reviews.author: Random collections

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I had a nasty sticker
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I had a nasty sticker, already hardened, on the bedroom mirror. a left over from our move 2 years ago. However, with this adhesive remover, that sticker was gone in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kessay

customer_reviews.title: Smells Better than Goo Gone
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells better than Goo Gone or whatever that stuff is called. I like that it has the applicator that lets you just brush over the area you want. You don't need to pour the stuff all over everything to get it covered or use q-tips or whatever to apply it. Seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This remover was a great product to use, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must say that the scrapper was a great tool to remove that sticky gooey glue residue
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Goo Gone for months and I've decided to give Duck Brand a try since it came with a scrapper. I must say that the scrapper was a great tool to remove that sticky gooey glue residue. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: KatZ

customer_reviews.title: No luck with difficult jobs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on it's great reviews. Unfortunately, it has not worked well in trying to remove some difficult stickers on both painted metal and chrome. I think my only recourse is a razor blade. Uggh! I was hoping to avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rappl

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle. It will take the stick off of ANYTHING! Its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: kara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this to clear my vehicle registration. It works fine
customer_reviews.author: Harry C.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product I've used (out of 3 or 4)
customer_reviews.text: I reuse glass bottles, so I do a lot of sticker removal. This is the best product I've used (out of 3 or 4). The rolling top and the scraper tool on the lid are great design features.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy.
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several other glue removal products but didn't do the trick. This removed it within seconds and didn't damage the leather.
customer_reviews.author: RRil

customer_reviews.title: The scrapper on the lid is small and not that great but using it does work but a larger one ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of an oil base but does the job very well and removes stickers with ease. The scrapper on the lid is small and not that great but using it does work but a larger one works better. I recommend it if you got any stickers on anything you want removed
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: To Remove Adhesive from Clothing
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! My daughter is always coming home form school with stickers on her shirt and we forget to take them off before we wash clothes. I used this on her shirt after washing it with a sticker on it and it came right off.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Burton

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is amazing. I love how it takes off the glue ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing. I love how it takes off the glue residue from stickers and such. Its great! Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McBeth

customer_reviews.title: shower stickers did not come off easily.
customer_reviews.text: was not too impressed. even after leaving product on for a while, shower stickers did not come off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Grace C

customer_reviews.title: works really well, messy though
customer_reviews.text: this stuff works really well, its just a little difficult to wash way the residue. Im pretty sure my window sill is a little sticky still. its also possible i am too much of a weakling to properly scrub it away.
customer_reviews.author: Shayda

customer_reviews.title: great product - love the applicators and extra tools
customer_reviews.text: the product itself does the job, but the real treat is the applicator - much better than spray-on or just pouring product over a big area. The squishy applicator puts product exactly where it needs to go and the cap scraper really helps with tough spots.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.Roark

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need and excellent shipment! From everything that I have read, this is a good product. I definitely recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was at first attracted by the scraper top, and a good "prime eligible" price. When it arrived, I found a very nice applicator under the cap. It's competitor, Goo Gone, just has an open bottle top, making it hard to use without getting it on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tailor Made

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazingly well for removing sticker residue from glass items.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money product dies not work
customer_reviews.text: I used it to remove a sticker logo mark on a canvas shoes, it did not work great already used a quarter if it, still the mark is noticeable
customer_reviews.author: David Noel

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I had two big marks on my car from duct tape for a couple years and tried Wd-40, goo gone, and other stuff and nothing worked, this stuff took it off in minutes. Just wipe it on and scrape it off with the plastic adapter that is on the cap and it's history.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Danruther

product_meta.title: Duck Brand 527263 Adhesive Remover 5.45-Ounce Bottle with Scraper Cap,Multicolor
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1Duck Brand Adhesive Remover easily removes tapes, adhesive residue, stickers, labels, tar, gum, caulk and more. This multi-purpose adhesive remover is perfect for both home and office use. It is safe for all types of surfaces, including walls, floors, doors, furniture, cars, metal, plastic, glass and wood. Each 5.45-Ounce bottle has a sponge applicator for easy and precise application and a convenient built-in scraper tool. Unlike other strong-smelling adhesive removers, Duck brand adhesive remover has a pleasant citrus scent and is VOC compliant in all states.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Duck Brand adhesive remover easily removes tapes, adhesive residue, stickers, labels, tar, gum, caulk and more. This multi-purpose adhesive remover is perfect for both home and office use. It is safe for all types of surfaces, including walls, floors, doors, furniture, cars, metal, plastic, glass and wood. Each 5.45-Ounce bottle has a sponge applicator for easy and precise application and a convenient built-in scraper tool. Unlike other strong-smelling adhesive removers, Duck brand adhesive remover has a pleasant citrus scent and is VOC compliant in all states.
feature_bullets: Features a no-mess sponge applicator and built-in heavy duty scraper
Removes tapes, adhesive residue, stickers, labels, tar, gum, caulk and more
Works on many surfaces and has pleasant citrus scent
